caption.center: ROBERT ALEX PERRY, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla. R. App. P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Highlands County; J. David Langford, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
ALTENBERND, C.J., and NORTHCUTT and SALCINES, JJ., Concur.
